Source.Name: aglio
Source.Summary: An API Blueprint renderer with theme support that outputs static HTML
Source.Description: An API Blueprint renderer that supports multiple themes and outputs static HTML that can be served by any web host. API Blueprint is a Markdown-based document format that lets you write API descriptions and documentation in a simple and straightforward way. Currently supported is API Blueprint format 1A.
